sentence.Network_en: I don't drive and the buses are quite hopeless.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不开车，公共汽车条件又太糟糕。

sentence.Network_en: His speeches were magnificently written but his delivery was hopeless.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的发言稿写得非常精彩，但他的演讲风格真是无可救药。

sentence.Network_en: We expected every drawing exercise to show us up as hopeless artists.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们预计每次素描练习都会令我们看上去像是不成气候的艺术家。

数据库_英语口语锦集（oralenglish）_软件世界网 ... helplessness 无助； hopeless 无望； joy 快乐；.

list.abs: 翻译词典... ... utterly hopeless 漆黑一团 It's utterly unfair. 这太不公平了。.
牛津英语8B&nbsp;Uni... ... 13. That sounds great. 那听起来很好. 14. feel hopeless 感到绝望 15. try to get inside 设法进去.
兴趣爱好... ... don't give up so early.( 别那么快就认输) it's hopeless.( 没希望了) don't give up yet.( 别灰心!).
dialog - 纱罗的博客 - 我的搜狐 ... A:You're hopeless. 你没救了。 A:Do you want it spicy? 你要辣吗？.

entry.def: If you feel hopeless, you feel very unhappy because there seems to be no possibility of a better situation or success.

example.ex: He had not heard her cry before in this uncontrolled, hopeless way...
example.tran: 他从未听到过她如此绝望地失声痛哭。

example.ex: The economic crisis makes jobs almost impossible to find and even able pupils feel hopeless about job prospects.
example.tran: 经济危机使得找到工作几乎成为不可能，就连能力出众的学生都对工作前景不抱希望。

entry.tran: 无望的;注定失败的;不会成功的
entry.def: Someone or something thing that is hopeless is certain to fail or be unsuccessful.

example.ex: I don't believe your situation is as hopeless as you think. If you love each other, you'll work it out...
example.tran: 我认为你们的情况并不像你想的那样无望。如果你们彼此相爱，总会找到解决办法的。

example.ex: A doctor is there to treat and to cure, not to dismiss anyone as a hopeless case.
example.tran: 医生的职责是治病救人，任何人都不能被看作是无药可救而打发走。

entry.tran: （人）没有希望（做好…）的，不行的，无能的
entry.def: If someone is hopeless at something, they are very bad at it.

example.ex: I'd be hopeless at working for somebody else...
example.tran: 要是让我为别人工作，我一定做不好。

example.ex: I was fine at sports, but pretty hopeless academically.
example.tran: 我的体育不错，但学习却很差。

entry.tran: 糟糕透顶的;无可救药的;极坏的
entry.def: You use hopeless to emphasize how bad or inadequate something or someone is.

example.ex: I don't drive and the buses are quite hopeless...
example.tran: 我不开车，公共汽车条件又太糟糕。

example.ex: Argentina's economic policies were a hopeless mess.
example.tran: 阿根廷的经济政策糟得一塌糊涂。

means.word_mean: 1. without hope because there seems to be no possibility of comfort or success;

sentences.sentence: "with a hopeless sigh he sat down"

means.word_mean: 2. of a person unable to do something skillfully;
4. (informal to emphasize how bad it is) beyond hope of management or reform;

sentences.sentence: "she handed me a hopeless jumble of papers"

auth_sentence.content: Why believe in a theory that leaves us hopeless?
auth_sentence.res_content: Why believe in a theory that leaves us hopeless?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Why believe in a theory that leaves us hopeless?

auth_sentence.content: What makes us hopeless neurological cases fight every day?
auth_sentence.res_content: What makes us hopeless neurological cases fight every day?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What makes us hopeless neurological cases fight every day?

auth_sentence.content: But that same complex task while drunk is hopeless.
auth_sentence.res_content: But that same complex task while drunk is hopeless.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But that same complex task while drunk is hopeless.

stems_affixes.word_buile: bound边界+less无……的→adj.无限的,无边无际的
care关心+less无……的,不……的→不关心→粗心的,疏忽的
color颜色+less无……的,不……的→adj.无色的
doubt怀疑+less无……的,不……的→adj. 无疑的,确定的
effort努力+less无……的,不……的→adj.不费力的
fathom测量深度;长度单位[6英尺]+less无……的,不……的→没法测量→深不可测的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无错误的,无缺点的,完美的
stems_affixes.word_buile: fault犯错误,欺骗+less无……的,不……的→adj.无错误的,无缺点的,完美的
feck价值,效果+less无……的,不……的→adj.无目标无计划的
flaw瑕疵+less无……的,不……的→adj.完美的,无瑕疵的
grace优美,文雅+less无……的,不……的→adj.粗俗的
hap机会,运气+less无→无运气的
help帮助+less无……的,不……的→adj.无助的,无能的,没用的
home家+less无……的,不……的→adj.无家可归的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 没有希望的,绝望的,不可救药
stems_affixes.word_buile: hope希望+less无……的,不……的→adj.没有希望的,绝望的,不可救药
nerve神经,胆量,勇气+less无……的,不……的→adj.无力的,无勇气的
regard注视;尊敬+less无……的,不……的→不注视,不尊敬→不放在眼里→不注意的
relent变宽厚,变温和+less无……的,不……的→adj.无情的,残酷的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 得不到休息的,不平静的,不安宁的
stems_affixes.word_buile: rest休息,静止+less无……的,不……的→adj.得不到休息的,不平静的,不安宁的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不省人事的,无感觉的,无意识的
stems_affixes.word_buile: sense感觉+less无……的,不……的→adj.不省人事的,无感觉的,无意识的
spine脊骨,书脊+less无……的,不……的→没骨气的
tire疲劳,劳累+less无……的,不……的→adj.不疲劳的
value价值+less无……的,不……的→adj.不足道的
regard注视;尊敬+less无……的,不……的→不注视,不尊敬→不放在眼里→不注意的

means.word_mean: 不抱希望的, 绝望的

sentences.en: He gave way to hopeless grief as soon as he heard the bad message.
sentences.cn: 一听到那个坏消息, 他立即陷入绝望的境地。

sentences.en: He was disappointed so often that he became hopeless.
sentences.cn: 他屡次失望, 以致变为了绝望。

means.word_mean: 不给人希望的, 无望的

sentences.en: He is hopeless about his chances of winning the contest.
sentences.cn: 他没有希望在竞赛中获胜。

jushi.english: He gave way to hopeless grief as soon as he heard the bad message.
jushi.chinese: 一听到那个坏消息,他立即陷入绝望的境地。

jushi.english: The dying man put up a valiant, but hopeless fight for life.
jushi.chinese: 那个垂死的人为了活下去进行英勇但又无望的斗争。

jushi.english: It is said that their position is hopeless.
jushi.chinese: 据说,他们的处境没有希望。
